title: Read Counts Per Sample
description: Total read counts for each sample within a group, as produced by the RUN workflow and concatenated by the DOWNSTREAM workflow. Each row represents one sample's read counts within its assigned group.

fields.name: sample
fields.title: Sample
fields.description: Sample identifier from the RUN workflow.

fields.name: n_reads_single
fields.title: Single-End Read Count
fields.description: Number of single-end reads. For paired-end data, this equals the number of read pairs multiplied by 2. For single-end data (e.g. ONT), this is the total number of reads.

fields.name: n_read_pairs
fields.title: Read Pair Count
fields.description: Number of read pairs. For single-end data (e.g. ONT), this is NA.

fields.name: group
fields.title: Group
fields.description: Group identifier assigned to this sample in the grouping TSV.
